Caches shader uniforms, reducing the number of times they are invoked.
palladium.config.resource_key_deduplicat: Deletes duplicates of resource key. (Needs restart)
palladium.config.resource_location_dedup: Deletes duplicates of chosen resource location. (Needs restart)
palladium.config.modern_state_holder.too: Caches blocks, improve collections. Disable this option if you have problems with blocks. (Needs restart)
palladium.config.modern_mob_goal_selecto: Enable new mob goal selector (target selector), If mobs do not lead themselves correctly, you can disable this option. (Needs restart)
